name: Daryabadi
text: Ta. Sin Mim.

name: Daryabadi
text: These are the verses of a Book luminous.

name: Daryabadi
text: Belike thou shalt kill thyself with grief because they become not believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: If We list, We can send down unto them a sign from the heaven so that their necks would became to it submissive.

name: Daryabadi
text: And there cometh not unto them any fresh admonition from the Compassionate but they are wont to be there from backsliders.

name: Daryabadi
text: So they have surely belied; wherefore anon there shall come unto them the truth of that whereat they were wont to mock.

name: Daryabadi
text: Observe they not the earth, how much We make to grow therein of every fruitful kind?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily therein is a sign; yet most of them are not believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: And recall what time thy Lord called unto Musa, saying: go thou unto the wrong-doing people.

name: Daryabadi
text: The people of Fir'awn; fear they Me not?

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: my Lord! verily I fear they shall belie me.

name: Daryabadi
text: And my breast straiteneth, and my tongue moveth not quickly: so send for Harun.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they have a crime against me, so I fear that they shall slay me.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: by no means. so go ye twain with Our signs; verily We shall be with you listening.

name: Daryabadi
text: So go ye twain unto Fir'awn and say: verily we are the apostles of the Lord of the Worlds,

name: Daryabadi
text: Send with us the Children of Isra'il?

name: Daryabadi
text: Fir'awn said: brought we not thee up amongst us as a child? And thou tarriedst amongst us for many years of thy life?

name: Daryabadi
text: And thou didst that thy deed which thou didst; and thou art of the ingrates.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: I did it then when I was mistaken.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then I fled from you when I feared you, and my Lord bestowed on me wisdom and made me one of the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: And that favour wherewith thou didst oblige me was that thou hadst enslaved the Children of Isra'il?

name: Daryabadi
text: Fir'awn said. and what is the Lord of the worlds?

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatsoever is in-between, if ye seek to be convinced.

name: Daryabadi
text: Fir'awn said unto those around him: hear ye not?

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: your Lord and the Lord of your ancient fathers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Fir'awn said: verily your apostle who hath been sent unto you is mad.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: Lord of the east and the west and whatsoever is in-between, if ye understand.

name: Daryabadi
text: Fir'awn said: if thou wilt take a god other than me, I shall surely place thee among the prisoners.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: even though I bring unto thee something manifest?

name: Daryabadi
text: Fir'awn said: forth with it then, if thou art of the truth- tellers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then he cast down his staff, and lo! it was a serpent manifest.

name: Daryabadi
text: And he drew forth his hand, and lo! it was white unto the beholders.

name: Daryabadi
text: Fir'awn said unto the chiefs around him: verily this is a magician knowing.

name: Daryabadi
text: He would drive you out of your land through his magic; what then is it ye command?

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: put off him and his brother, and send unto the cities callers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Thot they may bring to thee every magician knowing.

name: Daryabadi
text: So the magicians were assembled at a set time on a day made known.

name: Daryabadi
text: And it was said unto the people: are ye going to assemble.

name: Daryabadi
text: Belike we may follow the magicians if they are the winners?

name: Daryabadi
text: Then when the magicians came, they said unto Fir'awn: will there surely be a big hire for us if we are the winners?

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: yea; and ye shall verily then be of those brought nigh.

name: Daryabadi
text: Musa said unto them: cast whatsoever ye have to cast.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then they cast their cords and their staves, and said: by the might of Fir'awn, verily we! we shall be the winners.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then Musa cast down his staff, and lo! it swallowed up that which they had devised.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then the magicians flung themselves prostrate.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: we believe in the Lord of the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: The Lord of Musa and Harun.

name: Daryabadi
text: Fir'awn said: ye believed in him ere I gave you leave. Verily he is your chief who hath taught you magic, so ye shall surely come to know. Surely I shall cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides and surely I shall crucify you all.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: no harm! verily unto our Lord we are to return.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily we long that our Lord shall forgive us our faults because we have been the first of the believers

name: Daryabadi
text: And We revealed unto Musa saying: go by night with My bondmen verily ye shall be pursued.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then Fir'awn sent unto the cities callers:

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily these are but a band small.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily they have enraged US.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily we are host well-provided.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We drave them forth from gardens and springs.

name: Daryabadi
text: And treasures and a station noble.

name: Daryabadi
text: Even so. And We caused the Children of Isra'il to inherit them.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then they pursued them at sunrise.

name: Daryabadi
text: And when the two parties saw each other, the companions of Musa said: verily we are overtaken.

name: Daryabadi
text: Musa said: by no means; verily with me is my Lord; He shall guide me.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We revealed unto Musa, saying: smite thou the sea with thy staff. So it became separated, and each part was like unto a cliff mighty.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We brought near thither the others.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We delivered Musa and those with him together.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We drowned the others.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily herein is a sign; but most of them are not believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: And recite unto them the story of Ibrahim.

name: Daryabadi
text: When he said unto his father and his people: what worship ye?

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: we worship idols, and we are unto them ever devoted

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: hearken they unto you when ye cry?

name: Daryabadi
text: Or, benefit they you or hurt they you?

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: nay; but we found our fathers doing in this wise.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: have ye observed that which ye worship

name: Daryabadi
text: Ye and your fathers of old?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily they are an enemy unto me, save the Lord of the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: Who hath created me, and He guideth me.

name: Daryabadi
text: He Who feedeth me and giveth me to drink.

name: Daryabadi
text: And when I sicken, then He healeth me.

name: Daryabadi
text: And He Who shall cause me to die, and then shall quicken me.

name: Daryabadi
text: And He Who, long, shall forgive me my faults, on the Day of Requital.

name: Daryabadi
text: My Lord! bestow on me wisdom and join me with the righteous.

name: Daryabadi
text: And appoint for me an honourable mention among the posterity

name: Daryabadi
text: And make me one of the inheritors of the Garden of Delight.

name: Daryabadi
text: And forgive my father; verily he is of the erring.

name: Daryabadi
text: And humiliate me not on the Day whereon people shall be raised.

name: Daryabadi
text: The Day whereon will profit neither substance nor sons.

name: Daryabadi
text: Unless it be he, who shall bring unto Allah a whole heart,

name: Daryabadi
text: And the Garden shall be brought nigh to the God, fearing.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the Fierce Fire shall be made apparent unto the seduced ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: And it shall be said unto them where is that which ye were wont to worship?

name: Daryabadi
text: Beside Allah? Can they succour you or succour themselves?

name: Daryabadi
text: Then they shall be hurled therein, they and the seduced ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the hosts of Iblis together.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they, While contending therein, shall say:

name: Daryabadi
text: By Allah, we have indeed been in an error manifest.

name: Daryabadi
text: When we equalled you with the Lord of the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: And none led us astray except the Culprits.

name: Daryabadi
text: So none we have as intercessors.

name: Daryabadi
text: Nor any loving friend.

name: Daryabadi
text: Were there for us a return, we would be of the believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily herein is a sign, but most of them are not believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: And Nuh's people belied the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: When their brother Nuh said Unto them: fear ye not?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily I am unto you an apostle trusted.

name: Daryabadi
text: So fear Allah and obey me.

name: Daryabadi
text: And I ask of you no hire therefor; my hire is but with the Lord of the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: So fear Allah and obey me.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: shall We believe in thee when the meanest follow thee?

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: I have no knowledge of that which they have been Working.

name: Daryabadi
text: Their reckoning is upon my Lord, if ye but knew.

name: Daryabadi
text: And I am not to drive away the believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: I am naught but a warner manifest.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: if thou desistest not, thou shalt surely be of those stoned.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: my Lord! verily my people have belied me.

name: Daryabadi
text: So decide Thou between me and them with a decision, and deliver me and those who are with me of the believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Wherefore We delivered him and those with him in the laden ark.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We drowned the rest thereafter.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily herein is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: The'Aad belied the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: When their brother Hud said Unto them: fear ye not?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily I am unto you an apostle trusted.

name: Daryabadi
text: So fear Allah and obey me.

name: Daryabadi
text: And I ask of you no hire therefor: my hire is but with the Lord of the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: Build ye on every eminence a landmark in vanity?

name: Daryabadi
text: And take ye for yourselves castles that haply ye may abide.

name: Daryabadi
text: And when ye seize, ye seize like unto tyrants.

name: Daryabadi
text: So fear Allah, and obey me.

name: Daryabadi
text: And fear Him Who hath aided you with that which ye know.

name: Daryabadi
text: He hath aided you With Cattle and sons.

name: Daryabadi
text: And gardens and springs.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily I fear for you the torment of a Mighty Day.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: it is equal unto us whether thou admonishest or art not of the admonishers.

name: Daryabadi
text: This in but a custom of the ancients.

name: Daryabadi
text: And we are not going to be tormented.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they belied him; so We destroyed them. Verily herein is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily thy Lord? He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: The Thamud belied the sent ones

name: Daryabadi
text: When their brother Salih said unto them: fear ye not?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily I am unto you an apostle trusted.

name: Daryabadi
text: So fear Allah, and obey me.

name: Daryabadi
text: And I ask of you no hire therefor; MY hire is but with the Lord of the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: Shall ye be left secure in that which is here before us.

name: Daryabadi
text: In gardens and springs.

name: Daryabadi
text: And corn-fields and palm-trees whereof the spathes are fine?

name: Daryabadi
text: And hew ye out houses in the mountains skilfully! g

name: Daryabadi
text: So fear Allah, and obey me.

name: Daryabadi
text: And obey not the command of the extravagant.

name: Daryabadi
text: Who work corruption in the land and rectify not.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: thou art but one of the bewitched;

name: Daryabadi
text: Thou art but a human being like unto us. So bring thou a sign if thou art of the truth-tellers.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: yonder is a she-camel; to her a drink, and to you a drink, each on a day known.

name: Daryabadi
text: And touch her not with ill, lest there take hold of you the torment of a Mighty Day.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then they hamstrung her; and then they became regretful.

name: Daryabadi
text: So the torment took hold of them: verily herein is a sign, but most of them are not believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: The people of Lut belied the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: When their brother Lut said unto them: fear ye not?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily I am unto you an apostle trusted.

name: Daryabadi
text: So fear Allah, and obey me.

name: Daryabadi
text: And I ask of you no hire there for; my hire is but with the Lord of the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: Go ye in, of all creatures, unto the males?

name: Daryabadi
text: And leave ye your spouses your Lord hath created for you? Aye! ye are a people trespassing.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: if thou desistest not, O Lut! thou shalt surely be of those driven forth.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: verily I am of those who abhor your work.

name: Daryabadi
text: My Lord! deliver me and my household from that which they work.

name: Daryabadi
text: So We delivered him and his household all.

name: Daryabadi
text: Save an old woman among the lingerers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Thereafter We annihilated the rest.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We rained on them a rain. So ill was the rain on those warned?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily herein is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: The dwellers of the wood belied the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: What time Shu'aib, said unto them: fear ye not?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily I am unto you an apostle trusted.

name: Daryabadi
text: So fear Allah, and obey me.

name: Daryabadi
text: And ask of you no hire therefor; and my hire is but with the Lord of the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: Give full measure, and be not of those who cause others to lose.

name: Daryabadi
text: And weigh with a balance straight.

name: Daryabadi
text: And defraud not people of their things, and commit not corruption on the earth.

name: Daryabadi
text: So fear Him Who created you and the former generations.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: thou art but of the bewitched;

name: Daryabadi
text: And thou art but a human being like unto us, and we deem thee to be of the liars.

name: Daryabadi
text: So cause thou a fragment of the heaven to fall upon us, if thou art of the truth-tellers.

name: Daryabadi
text: He. said: My Lord is the Best Knower of that which ye work.

name: Daryabadi
text: Thenn they belied him; wherefore there laid hold of -them the torment of day of shadow. Verily it was the torment of a Mighty Day.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily herein is a sign; but most of them are not believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily it is a revelation of the Lord of the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: The Trusted spirit hath brought it down.

name: Daryabadi
text: Upon thy heart, that thou mayest be of the warners,

name: Daryabadi
text: In plain Arabic speech.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily it is in the Scriptures of the ancients.

name: Daryabadi
text: Is it not a sign unto them that the learned among the Children of Isra'il know it?

name: Daryabadi
text: And had We revealed it unto any of the ncn-Arabs,

name: Daryabadi
text: And he had-read it unto them, even then they would not have been believers therein.

name: Daryabadi
text: In this wise have We made way for it into the hearts of the culprits.

name: Daryabadi
text: They will not believe therein until they behold the torment afflictive.

name: Daryabadi
text: It shall come unto them on a sudden, and they shall not perceive.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then they will say: are we to be respited?

name: Daryabadi
text: Seek haste then they with our torment?

name: Daryabadi
text: Beholdest thou? - if We let them enjoy for years.

name: Daryabadi
text: And then there cometh unto them that which they had been promised.

name: Daryabadi
text: What shall that which they enjoyed avail them?

name: Daryabadi
text: And We destroyed not a city but it had its warners.

name: Daryabadi
text: By way of admonition, and We have never been oppressors.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the satans have not brought it down.

name: Daryabadi
text: It behoveth them not, nor they can.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily far from hearing are they removed.

name: Daryabadi
text: So call not thou unto anot her god along with Allah, lest thou be of the doomed.

name: Daryabadi
text: And warn thou thy clan, the nearest ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: And lower thou thy Wlng Unto those who follow thee as believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And if they disobey thee, say thou: verily I am quit of that which ye work.

name: Daryabadi
text: And rely thou upon the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: Who seeth thee when thou standest up

name: Daryabadi
text: And thy movements among those who fall prostrate.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily He! He is the Hearer, the Knower.

name: Daryabadi
text: Shall declare unto you upon whom the satans descend!

name: Daryabadi
text: They descend upon every calumniator, sinner.

name: Daryabadi
text: Who give ear, and most of them are liars.

name: Daryabadi
text: As for the poets -it is the seduced who follow them.

name: Daryabadi
text: Observest thou not, that they Wander about every vale.

name: Daryabadi
text: And that they say that which they do not?

name: Daryabadi
text: Save those who believed and worked righteous works and remembered Allah much, and vindicated themselves after they had been wronged. And anon those who do wrong shall come to know with what a translating they shall be translated.
